Verses: 1 sebaavin Raajasthree Saalomonin Keerththiyaik Kelvippattapodhu, Vidukadhaigalinaale Saalomonai Sodhikkiradharkaaga, Migundha Parivaaraththodum, Kandhavarkkangalaiyum, Migudhiyaana Ponnaiyum Raththinangalaiyum Sumakkira Ottagangalodum Erusalemukku Vandhaal; Aval Saalomonidaththil Vandhapodhu, Than Manadhilirundha Ellaavatraiyum Kuriththu Avanidaththil Sambaashiththaal.
2 appozhudhu Saalomon Aval Kettavaigalaiyellaam Viduviththaan; Avalukku Viduvikkaadhapadikku Ondraagilum Saalomonukku Maraiporulaayirukkavillai.
3 sebaavin Raajasthree Saalomonudaiya Paanapaaththirakkaararaiyum, Avar Aramanaiyaiyum,

4 avan Pandhiyin Pojanapadhaarththangalaiyum, Avan Oozhiyakkaararin Veedugalaiyum, Avan Uththiyogastharin Varisaiyaiyum, Avargal Vasthirangalaiyum, Avanudaiya Paanapaaththirakkaararaiyum, Avargal Vasthirangalaiyum, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththukkul Pravesikkum Nadaimandabaththaiyum Kandapodhu Aval Aachchariyaththaal Bramaikondu,
5 raajaavai Nokki: Ummudaiya Varththamaanangalaiyum Ummudaiya Gnaanaththaiyum Kuriththu, Naan En Dhesaththile Ketta Seydhi Meyyaayitru.

6 naan Vandhu Adhai En Kangalaal Kaanumattum Avargal Vaarththaigalai Nambavillai; Ummudaiya Periya Gnaanaththil Paadhiyaagilum Avargal Enakku Arivikkavillai; Naan Kelvippatta Prasthaabaththaippaarkkilum Adhigam Undaayirukkiradhu.
7 ummudaiya Janangal Baakkiyavaangal; Eppodhum Umakku Munbaaga Nindru, Ummudaiya Gnaanaththaik Ketkira Ummudaiya Oozhiyakkaararum Baakkiyavaangal.

8 ummudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Munbaaga Neer Raajaavaayirukkumpadikku, Ummaith Thammudaiya Singaasanaththinmel Veetrirukkappanna, Ummel Piriyankonda Ummudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Sthoththirikkappaduvaaraaga; Ummudaiya Dhevan Isravelai Endrendraikkum Nilainiruththumpadikku Snegikkiradhinaale, Avar Nyaayamum Needhiyumseygiradharku Ummai Avargalmel Raajaavaaga Vaiththaar Endraal

9 aval Raajaavukku Nootrirubadhu Thaalandhu Ponnaiyum, Migudhiyaana Kandhavarkkangalaiyum, Raththinangalaiyum Koduththaal; Sebaavin Raajasthree Raajaavaagiya Saalomonukkukkoduththa Appadippatta Kandhavarkkangalaippola Orukkaalum Varavillai.
10 oppeerilirundhu Ponnaik Konduvarugira Eeraamin Velaikkaararum Saalomonin Velaikkaararum Vaasanaimarangalaiyum Raththinangalaiyum Konduvandhaargal.

11 andha Vaasanaimarangalaal Raajaa Karththarudaiya Aalayaththukkum Raaja Aramanaikkum Oondrukaalgalaiyum, Sangeedhakkaararukku Suramandalangalaiyum Thamburugalaiyum Undaakkinaan; Appadippattavaigal Adharku Munne Yoodheyaa Dhesaththil Orukkaalum Kaanappadavillai.

12 sebaavin Raajasthree Raajaavukkuk Konduvandhavaigalaippaarkkilum Adhigamaai Aval Aasaippattukketta Ellaavatraiyum Raajaavaagiya Saalomon Avalukkuk Koduththaan; Pinbu Aval Than Parivaaraththodunkooda Than Dhesaththirkuth Thirumbipponaal.
13 vyaabaarigalum Varththagarum Konduvarum Ponnaiththavira, Saalomonukku Ovvoru Varushaththilum Vandha Pon Arunootru Arubaththaaru Thaalandhu Niraiyaayirundhadhu.
14 arabidhesaththu Sagala Raajaakkalum Maagaanangalin Adhipadhigalum Saalomonukkup Ponnaiyum Velliyaiyum Konduvaruvaargal.
15 raajaavaagiya Saalomon Irunooru Parisaigalai Adiththa Ponthagattaal Seyviththaan; Ovvoru Parisaikku Arunooru Sekkal Nirai Ponthagattai Selavazhiththaan.
16 adiththa Ponthagattaal Munnoorukedagangalaiyum Undaakkinaan; Ovvoru Kedagaththirku Munnooru Sekkalnirai Ponnai Selavazhiththaan; Avaigalai Raajaa Leebanon Vanam Ennum Maaligaiyile Vaiththaan.
17 raajaa Thandhaththinaal Oru Periya Singaasanaththaiyum Seyviththu, Adhaip Pasumponthagattaal Moodinaan.

18 andha Singaasanaththukkup Ponninaal Seyyappatta Aaru Padigalum, Oru Paadhapadiyum, Utkaarum Idaththirku Irupuraththilum Kaichchaaimaanangalum Irundhadhu; Irandu Singangal Kaichchaaimaanangal Aruge Nindradhu.
19 andha Aaru Padigalinmelum, Irandu Pakkaththilum Pannirandu Singangal Nindradhu, Endha Raajyaththilum Ippadip Pannappadavillai.

20 raajaavaagiya Saalomonukku Irundha Paanapaaththirangalellaam Ponnum, Leebanon Vanam Ennum Maaligaiyin Panimuttugalellaam Pasumponnumaayirundhadhu; Ondrum Velliyinaal Seyyappadavillai; Saalomonin Naatkalil Velli Oru Porulaai Ennappadavillai.

21 raajaavin Kappalgal Eeraamin Velaikkaararudan Tharsheesukkup Poivarum; Tharsheesin Kappalgal Moondru Varushaththukku Orudharam Ponnaiyum, Velliyaiyum, Yaanaith Thandhangalaiyum, Kurangugalaiyum, Mayilgalaiyum Konduvarum.
22 boomiyin Raajaakkalaippaarkkilum Raajaavaagiya Saalomon Aisuvariyaththilum Gnaanaththilum Sirandhavanaayirundhaan.
23 saalomonin Irudhayaththile Dhevan Aruliya Gnaanaththaik Ketpadharku Boomiyin Raajaakkal Ellaarum Avan Mugadharisanaththaith Thedinaargal.

24 varushaavarusham Avaravar Thangal Kaanikkaiyaagiya Vellippaaththirangalaiyum, Porpaaththirangalaiyum, Vasthirangalaiyum, Aayudhangalaiyum, Sugandhavarkkangalaiyum, Kudhiraigalaiyum, Koverukazhudhaigalaiyum Konduvaruvaargal.

25 saalomonukku Naalaayiramkudhirai Laayangalum Radhangalum Irundhadhu, Panneeraayiram Kudhiraiveerarum Irundhaargal; Avaigalai Radhangal Vaikkumpattanangalilum, Avargalai Erusalemil Thannidaththilum Raajaa Vaiththirundhaan.
26 nadhithuvakkip Pelistharin Dhesamattukkum Egipthin Ellaivaraikkum Irukkira Sagala Raajaakkalaiyum Avan Aandaan.
27 erusalemile Raajaa Velliyaik Karkalpolavum, Kedhurumarangalaip Pallaththaakkugalil Irukkum Kaattaththimarangalpolavum Adhigamaakkinaan.
28 egipthilum Matra Dhesangalilumirundhu Saalomonukkuk Kudhiraigal Konduvarappattadhu.

29 saalomonudaiya Aadhiyandhamaana Nadapadigal Theerkkadharisiyaagiya Naaththaanin Pusthagaththilum, Seeloniyanaagiya Agiyaa Ezhudhina Theerkkadharisanaththilum, Nebaaththin Kumaaranaagiya Yerobeyaamaikkuriththu Gnaanadhrushtikkaaranaagiya Iththo Ezhudhina Dharisanangalilum Allavo Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
30 saalomon Erusalemile Isravelaiyellaam Naarpadhu Varusham Arasaandaan.

31 pinbu Saalomon Than Pidhaakkalode Niththiraiyadaindhaan; Avanai Avan Thagappanaagiya Dhaaveedhin Nagaraththile Adakkampanninaargal; Avan Sthaanaththile Avan Kumaaranaagiya Rekobeyaam Raajaavaanaan.
